text: Planet of Exile is a 1966 science-fiction book that was written by Ursula K. Le Guin in her Hainish Cycle. It was first part of an Ace Double in 1966 with Mankind Under the Leash by Thomas M. Disch. == Translations == * ("Planet of Exile"), 1980, 1992, 1993, 1997, 1999, 2006 * Category:1966 books Category:Hainish Cycle
title: Planet of Exile
